document.full_text: carlos boozer, who had been averaging 11.4 points in the series, scored 23 and chicago's defense limited atlanta to 36 percent shooting as the bulls advanced to the eastern conference finals.
document.title: bulls 93, hawks 73: boozer and the bulls' defense are too much for the hawks
lines_and_colors: carlos boozer, who had been averaging 11.4 points in the series, scored 23 and chicago's defense limited atlanta to 36 percent shooting as the bulls advanced to the eastern conference finals.
